page.title: 07Where the People Live
page.content: In Tadcaster there are three new{ {housing}estates. They contain in all about one to two hundred houses. They are built of brick or{stone}which comes from the local quarries. The new estates are called Mayfield Park and an old peoples' housing estate called Spring Hill. There it is specially formulated for{old people}with special ramps and lifts to help old people to the top of their stairs. Mayfield Park is a modern housing estate with about one hundred houses. They are mainly for{families}of about four to six people. They all have two bathrooms, one upstairs and one downstairs. They have three bedrooms and a loft which can be converted to a bedroom with a skylight.
